description:
Franky and Sanji continue to battle the thugs of CP9. Meanwhile, Luffy and the rest of the gang find themselves headed for a collision that could spell doom for everyone!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combat sur le toit ! Franky contre Nero !
Yane no Ue no Kettou! Franky VS Nero
Дуэль на крыше! Фрэнки против Неро
قتال فوق السطح! فرانكي ضد نيرو
屋根の上の決闘! フランキーVSネロ
